page.title: 18T.G.GREEN LTD.
page.content: Established in 1826,the factory has a work-force of about 300. Some{local yellow clay,}supplied by the{National Coal Board,}is used as well as{white clay}from{Cornwall. Kitchen and table-ware is manufactured with goods ranging from{egg-cups}to {tea-pots}and{casserole dishes. Goods are sold to shops all over the country,{Marks and Spencer}being a major customer.About 25% of goods are exported.Many things are made by pour- ing clay into moulds. Excess clay is drained off and the pots left to dry. Plates and dishes are made on presses. Colour is put on by spraying and lines are made by lathing off.Patterns are put on with transfers.The pots then pass through the kiln.This is the buscuit stage glaze is sprayed on and the goods are fired again for 12 hrs. n
